[Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_comment-text) Try the Space Data centers, there is no problem of heating there and there is free solar energy to power the Data center in space. Star Cloud and Star link are the companies who are trying it out. There would be challenges for Microsoft to work on if the space cloud centers gain traction in the CSP market. I will be writing a post to be published on Thursday on what a star cloud VBE model means to existing players VBE model.

The solution is in the design architectures and the paradigm shift in this direction. This means, we must shift towards specialized compute to cover specific computational needs. One example is the thermodynamic chips that excel at AI training and offer higher efficiency than GPUs. It delves into the realm of quantum and probabilistic computing, which can further benefit from shifts into the materials we use to manufacture chips - such as Bismuth instead of silicon.
